title: Pixel XL suddenly started hanging and apps stop responding.
content:
So 2 weeks ago my phone went from running fine to the UI crashing and needing to reboot every time the phone was started. 
Managed to return it to factory settings and then it worked normally for 2 days and now the phone Hangs all the time and some times give the app not responding alerts but if you select wait it works again.

I know the phone is about 3 years old but is there a fix for this issue?
